title: 94/289/EC: Council Decision of 16 May 1994 on the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters on the provisional application of the Protocol defining, for the period 1 December 1993 to 30 November 1996, the fishing opportunities and the financial contibution provided for by the Agreement between the European Community and the Government of Mauritius on fishing in the waters of Mauritius
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 16 May 1994 on the conclusion of an Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters on the provisional application of the Protocol defining, for the period 1 December 1993 to 30 November 1996, the fishing opportunities and the  financial contibution provided for by the Agreement between the European Community and the Government of Mauritius on fishing in the waters of Mauritius (94/289/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters on the provisional application of the Protocol defining, for the period 1 December 1993 to 30 November 1996, the fishing opportunities and the financial contribution provided for by the  Agreement between the European Community and the Government of Mauritius on fishing in the waters of Mauritius is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council is hereby authorized to designate the persons empowered to sign the Agreement in the form of an exchange of letters in order to bind the Community.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 May 1994.
For the Council
The President
Th. PANGALOS
(1) OJ No L 159, 10. 6. 1989, p. 1.
